about_the_game:
Embark on an epic journey through medieval China in this immersive building and survival simulation. Begin as a humble worker, learning construction and crafting techniques. Develop your settlement, build workshops, and prepare for the Emperor’s summons to undertake monumental projects along the Great Wall.

Experience an engrossing step-by-step building system, where every meticulously designed structure showcases your growing expertise. As your skills evolve, you'll be able to construct ever more impressive edifices.

Freely explore and expand your idyllic riverside village, nestled among breathtaking hillsides and mountain ranges. Shape your settlement to your vision, laying the foundations that will lead you to the far reaches of the Empire, across three distinct landscapes - the Mountains, the Desert, and the River, where you'll construct authentic Great Wall monuments.

Craft tools, build structures, cook recipes, cultivate food, raise livestock, gain experience, and transform the Great Wall into a monument that will stand the test of time. Your adventure begins the moment you lay the first brick.




Roll up your sleeves and dive into the work! Construct sections of the Great Wall, including its most intriguing landmarks, such as the Jiayu Desert Fort, the nine arch bridge at Jiumenkou Pass, and Jiankou’s Heavenly Ladder. Master the art of construction in your settlement, where you'll need to set up your own brickworks, stone workshop, carpentry shop, foundry, weaving mill, and more, all vital for producing the resources required for the Great Wall.



Unleash your creativity! Gather essential materials and craft various tools and equipment to streamline your work. As your building skills improve, you'll also learn advanced decorative techniques, allowing you to create stunning sculptures, lanterns, bells, gongs, and other adornments to beautify the world and lend it character.



Demonstrate your farming prowess! Raise livestock, collect eggs, fish, cultivate fields, and plant rice, radishes, cilantro and other crops you discover in your explorations. Be diligent and resourceful – a watchful eye ensures a prosperous harvest.



Good nourishment is essential! Cook delicious meals to boost your energy and improve your health. Each dish provides unique benefits, enhancing your building efforts. Discover and prepare a variety of authentic Chinese recipes, provided you can find the ingredients. Life is better when you’re well-fed.



Advance your skills and technologies! Expand your village and upgrade production workshops to create superior building materials essential for the construction of the Great Wall. Completing projects will earn you the Emperor’s favor, leading to promotions and grander projects, establishing you as a renowned architect of the Great Wall.



Take on the mantle of leadership! The villager management system allows you to streamline your work by planning tasks, issuing commands, and overseeing workers. Villagers will assist you by gathering resources, producing materials, farming and cooking, creating a well-coordinated team of workers.



Experience the stories of Jun and his granddaughter, Mei, who will guide you through the world, teaching you their crafts. As you develop a closer bond with each of them, they will unveil their troubled past, the secrets kept close to their heart, and what they believe will lead their people to a better future.

Your adventure awaits… in Chinese Frontiers.

name: Chinese Frontiers

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3 GHz Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 / Radeon RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game is still in development, requirements may change.

short_description: Build the Great Wall and other iconic medieval Chinese landmarks in this single-player builder and survival game. Expand your settlement, manage NPCs, explore, gather, craft, decorate, farm, cook, and raise livestock. Climb the ranks of a master builder and pave your way to establishing an Empire.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese, Polish, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Thai, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
